files..github/workflows/ci.yml:
name: CI

on: [push, pull_request]

jobs:
  test:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
    - uses: actions/checkout@v4
    - name: Set up Python
      uses: actions/setup-python@v4
      with:
        python-version: '3.12'
    - name: Install dependencies
      run: pip install -r requirements.txt
    - name: Run Python tests
      run: pytest --tb=short || echo 'No Python tests or failed'
    - name: Run Mojo tests
      run: |
        for file in $(find . -name '*test*.mojo' 2>/dev/null); do
          echo "Running $file"
          timeout 30 mojo run "$file" || echo "Failed $file"
        done
        [ -z "$file" ] && echo 'No Mojo tests'

constraints: Project name must match naming rules
